name: Extract DevAddr
define type of device
Sensor data hex/string decode
info:
This node decode the payload
from HEX to String

name: HEX to base64
info:
This node will convert the message
on base64 format

Input: HEX message
Output: Base64 message

name: Extract Information
info:
From the string in Input,
this node will convert it on a dict
with this format: 
{unit_measure : value}

label: Smart Agricolture
info:
This flow read a a payload in HEX, convert it
in Base64, and put on output the message in ASCII

name: function
Device Identification
func:
/*
    0: L0
    1: L1
    2: L4
    */

var Devices = ["AAC44AC5", "AAABB14A", "AAC44AC6"]

addr = msg.DevAddr

//node.warn(addr)

switch(Devices.indexOf(addr))
{
    case 0:
        msg.topic = "L0 Board"
        node.send([msg, null, null, null, null])
    break;
    case 1:
        msg.topic = "L1 Board"
        node.send([null, msg, null, null, null])
    break;
    case 2:
        msg.topic = "L4 Board"
        node.send([null, null, msg, null, null])
    break;
    case 3:
        msg.topic = "xx Board"
        node.send([null, null, null, msg, null])
    break;
    case 4:
        msg.topic = "xx Board"
        node.send([null, null, null, null ,msg])
    break;
}

name: state
